content: acorn baby blanket by alice kalush written 4/6/2025 updated 4/9/2025 size 6 needles for starting and ending borders size 8 for rest of blanket updated 5/12/2025 row 12 - repeat ends with k2 previously was k1 in written instructions chart was already correct updated 6/1/2025 corrected total number of stitches for 9 11 12 13 repeats top of page 2 copyright © 2025 by alice kalush you are free to use and share this pattern and sell items made with it please give credit to me if publishing this pattern elsewhere if published elsewhere permission from me is required if customers are charged for the publication it appears in 31 inches wide by 36 inches long 10 repeats 3 skeins i love this yarn light stage size 6 and size 8 needles acorn baby blanket page 1 of 7 multiple of 12 stitches + 1 + border 2 * 8 10 repeats across = 12 * 10 + 1 + 16 = 137 sttiches 125 stitches 9 repeats 149 11 repeats 161 12 repeats 173 13 repeats for the 10 repeat across blanket 31 wide by 36 long 7 repeats long each repeat is 3 by 5 acorn baby blanket page 2 of 7 acorn baby blanket page 3 of 7 cast on 137 stitches using size 6 needles starting border knit 16 row switch to size 8 needles the pattern k8 follow instructions below for each row k8 row 1 rs * p1 k4 p3 k4 * p1 row 2 ws k1 * p4 k3 p4 k1 * row 3 rs * k4 p2 k1 p2 k3 * k1 row 4 ws p1 * p3 k2 p1 k2 p4 * row 5 rs * k3 p2 k1 p1 k1 p2 k2 * k1 row 6 ws p1 * p2 k2 p1 k1 p1 k2 p3 * row 7 rs * k2 p2 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p2 k1 * k1 row 8 ws p1 * p1 k2 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k2 p2 * row 9 rs * k1 p2 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p2 * k1 row 10 ws p1 * k2 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k2 p1 * row 11 rs * p2 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 * p1 row 12 ws k1 * k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k2 * row 13 rs * p2 k2 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k2 p1 * p1 row 14 ws k1 * k1 p2 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p2 k2 * row 15 rs * p2 k3 p1 k1 p1 k3 p1 * p1 row 16 ws k1 * k1 p3 k1 p1 k1 p3 k2 * row 17 rs * p2 k4 p1 k4 p1 * p1 row 18 ws k1 * k1 p4 k1 p4 k2 * row 19 rs * k1 p2 k7 p2 * k1 row 20 ws p1 * k2 p7 k2 p1
